thread.title: Father recalls last words with daughter trapped in Russian mall fire

title: Father recalls last words with daughter trapped in Russian mall fire
text:
Father recalls last words with daughter trapped in Russian mall fire Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 00:46 
Deadly shopping mall fire in the Siberian city of Kemerovo started in playroom, according to Russian firefighter leading to public anger over lax fire safety. Rough cut
